title: panic: runtime error: close of nil channel

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
I'm running Syncthing 0.9.13, on Windows 8.1 x64. This panic happens sometimes (i.e., this also happens in earlier versions.) The user is not using computer when Syncthing panics, so I have no idea what's going on.

UPnP and local discovery is enabled, while global discovery disabled on this node.
